short_summary: , Procurement ofJanitorial Services for U-100 Building, and submits bids through Ariba Discovery, in which contact information as well as a request for site visit is provided.
description: AMENDMENT TO CLOSING TIME, Procurement of Janitorial Services including all labour, material and equipment, to provide services in accordance with the Statement of Work, and must fulfill site visit commitment as described in the tender description.
full_summary:
================
## Janitorial Services Tender for U-100 Building in NCR

### Solicitation Number: WS4308483574
### Reference Number: WS4308483574-Doc4308573338
### Tender Closing Date: February 5, 2024 at 2:00 p.m. EST

**Solicitation Description**

The Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC) of Canada invites bidders to provide janitorial services for Public Works and Government Services Canada (PWGSC) located at 1901 Research Rd, U100, Ottawa, Ontario, Canada.

### Job Requirements

* Provide all labour, material, and equipment required for janitorial services
* Services must be provided in accordance with the Statement of Work attached at Annex "B"

### Tender Documents and Requirements

* Bidders must submit required supporting documentation and bid submission no later than February 5, 2024 at 2:00 p.m. EST
* Failure to comply will result in the bid being declared non-responsive

### Site Visit and Mandatory Attendance

* A site visit has been arranged for January 16, 2024 at 10:30 a.m.
* Bidders must communicate with the Contracting Authority no later than January 9, 2024 at 12:00 p.m. EST to confirm attendance and provide the name(s) and date of birth of the person(s) who will attend
* Non-compliance will not be permitted to attend the site visit

### Contract Information

* Expected contract start date: June 1, 2024
* Expected contract end date: Not specified
* Procurement method: Competitive - Open Bidding
* Selection criteria: Lowest Price

### Trade Agreements

* This tender is subject to the following trade agreements:
	+ Canada-Peru Free Trade Agreement (CPFTA)
	+ Canada-Panama Free Trade Agreement
	+ Canada-UK Trade Continuity Agreement (Canada-UK TCA)
	+ Canada-Ukraine Free Trade Agreement (CUFTA)
	+ Canada-European Union Comprehensive Economic and Trade Agreement (CETA)
	+ Comprehensive and Progressive Agreement for Trans-Pacific Partnership (CPTPP)
	+ Canada-Korea Free Trade Agreement (CKFTA)
	+ World Trade Organization Agreement on Government Procurement (WTO GPA)
	+ North American Free Trade Agreement (NAFTA)
	+ Canada-Chile Free Trade Agreement (CCFTA)
	+ Canada-Honduras Free Trade Agreement
	+
